metadata.title: CVE-2014-5019 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The multisite feature in Drupal 6.x before 6.32 and 7.x before 7.29 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP Hostheader, related to determining which configuration file to use.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.32-1').
